text: @EricTrump Yes it will be because the UBER WEALTHY got a huge break and the rest of us are making it up so yeah it will be better Eric, but hey your Dad doesn't read, and clearly your not good at match.  Ask yourself this, prior to Covid19, how in a booming economy does the deficit grow?
